Topic.Title: help i  can't take an item

Posts.EditableText: i made an item but can't take it
Posts.HTML: i made an item but can't take it

Posts.EditableText: take as i mean get it in game
Posts.HTML: take as i mean get it in game

Posts.EditableText:
With your item highlighted on the left hand menu, click on the 'inventory' tab in the right hand screen. You'll see a little tick box that says 'Object can be taken'. Make sure it's ticked!

Is that what you were looking for?

Conversely, if you make items you don't want people moving around - maybe it's a container like a desk or a cabinet, or something you have to use such as a sink - make sure the box ISN'T ticked.
